person.content:

In the given paragraph, the only person entity mentioned is "NYMEX". It is an abbreviation for the New York Mercantile Exchange, which is a physical commodities, futures, and derivatives exchange located in New York City.

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| NYMEX |
